name: fullsoak-nodejs-examples
description: example using FullSoak framework on Node.js

scripts.build:alpha: tsc --outDir dist --jsx react-jsx --allowImportingTsExtensions --noEmit --target esnext --moduleResolution nodenext --module nodenext --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --rewriteRelativeImportExtensions --skipLibCheck --verbatimModuleSyntax src/main.ts
